003892BF.desc:
Damaging a Close enemy with {c_important}Marksman{/c} or {c_important}Cutthroat{/c} Skills each grant a {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed bonus for {c_number}{buffduration:RANGED_BONUS}{/c} seconds.

While both Attack Speed bonuses are active, you deal {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage against Crowd Controlled enemies.

A320401E.Buff8_Description: Increased damage vs Crowd Controlled enemies
